Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    This class constructs and holds all elements within the game
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Nathan Preston

    • Constructor Detail

      • Map

        public Map(int height,
           int width,
           Tile[][] level,
           int startX,
           int startY,
           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> enemiesList,
           Manager gm)
        Create a new map instance.
        Parameters:
        height - height of the map.
        width - width of the map.
        level - array of tiles representing the map.
        startX - starting x coordinate.
        startY - starting y coordinate.
        enemiesList - list of enemies on the map.
        gm - game manager.

      • openDoor

        public void openDoor(Tile d,
                     java.util.LinkedList<Item> playerInv,
                     int n)
        Checks for the type of door, then searches player's inventory for whether they have the necessary item(s), If the necessary items are found, the door becomes a floor
        Parameters:
        d - the door to be opened
        playerInv - the player's inventory to be searched through
        n - the number of token the player has
